segments.text: Actually , you can take advantage of our " New Millennium Woman " promotion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does that include some kind of " Love , Amy Card " ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . If your " Love , Amy " purchases amount to 10,000 NT or more , you get a V . I . P . card and a 20 percent discount .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmmm ... I'll have to think about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Just think for a bit . I'll go help another customer . I'll be right back .
segments.speaker: S1
